column5: Progress your career into a marketing leadership role by studying our MSc Management with Marketing. Taught by experts, applying theory to practical from day one.A CAREER-FOCUSED MSC MANAGEMENT WITH MARKETING, DESIGNED FOR ASPIRING MARKETING LEADERSThis 100% online MSc Management with Marketing is for leaders and aspiring leaders aiming to progress into more senior roles in marketing teams. As you study, you’ll be developed into a well-rounded, thoughtful, active, reflective and practical marketer with a genuine appreciation of strategic management and dealing with operational challenges when running an organisation, particularly through the lens of a marketing leader.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
